name: Liondoro
0:
”Alexa, open lion doro”
”Alexa, lion doro”
”Alexa, start lion doro”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lion doro
des:
Who is the target user: A person that needs to study for extended periods of time (i.e a student)
What problem does it solve: Study Sessions for endless durations are ineffective/inefficient. 
Our skill: To provide a timer separating studying time and breaks, with spoken inspirational quotes as fun motivators
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
